text: Michael Roth (18 June 1936 â€“ 23 July 2019) was a German engineer. He was professor of automation, specializing in microprocessor technology, computer science and sociology as well as philosophy of science. He was one of the founders of computer engineering in Germany. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German engineers Category:German computer scientists
